website_summaries.verdict: Coming from the Skechers Burst Collection, the Skechers Burst – Donlen, with the Air Cooled Memory Foam insole, offers instant superior comfort and maximum cushioning. The lightweight feeling and flexibility of this low-top shoe are offered by its soft, responsive Burst Compound. Its Burst Compound midsole provides great energy response and impact protection. The stylish design of the shoe also comes in a variety of colorways and with each pair sold at a wallet-friendly price.
pros: A lot of the reviewers expressed that the Skechers Burst – Donlen feels lightweight on foot
The Skechers Burst – Donlen provides great comfort on foot as what most of the users stated
A good number of buyers loved the stylish design of the sneaker
Several of the users claimed that the shoe provides good arch support and overall cushioning
The shoe can match with various outfit types, according to some of the commenters
A handful of reviewers have been loyal users of the shoe, owning a few pairs already
Most users admired the durability of the shoe
One buyer said that the shoe didn’t need any break-in period
A user noted that the shoe dries up quickly as he uses them for fishing
Most reviewers said that they recommend the product
A buyer can choose from a variety of colorways offered for the shoe
One can purchase the shoe at a rather affordable price
cons: A reviewer claimed that the Skechers Burst – Donlen needs a removable insole
One user complained about the sneaker getting loose in fit with wear
A few of the commenters said that the shoe fits a little wide on foot

customer_reviews.title: Another great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Skechers leisure shoes have got to be the most comfortable shoe ever, i suffer from aching feet when walking but these are so comfortable it's like walking on air, since i started wearing Skechers i won't buy another brand, i have about 5 pairs now and these are really nice, they look stylish and feel great. One thing you have to be aware of with Skechers is that they all 'breath', they let the air in to cool your feet but that means you don't want to go splashing in puddles with them!
customer_reviews.author: colin thomas

customer_reviews.title: High hopes but sadly Worst Buy Ever :(
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would - Was so excited to find a similar pair to my usual Skechers but these are honestly the most uncomfortable sketchers I’ve ever tried - have started to fall apart after a few wears :( really really disappointed I’m afraid- these were complete waste of money - if I could return I would!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Twintastic

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on the moon!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as they were on offer, not sure about the looks. When they arrived I really loved them, they're half super-modern style and half knitted by your nan with love :) They are supremely lightweight and have the bounciest most comfortable soles ever. Superb
customer_reviews.author: alw Audio

customer_reviews.title: they are amazing to walk on
customer_reviews.text: Never owned any memory foam shoes before, bought these during this cyber monday week for half price, they are amazing to walk on, walking 5 miles feels like 2 miles honestly, because I think that's the point of memory foam. I personally don't think most memory foam shoes look great, and these look about as good as I think you can get without losing performance.
customer_reviews.author: rgesrhg

customer_reviews.title: Another pair to the collection
customer_reviews.text: I have about 10 pairs of various Skechers , all are so light and comfortable . I won't buy anything else . I couldn't resist at this price
customer_reviews.author: Villan57

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: A very light shoe - wouldn’t say it was a trainer but more a lace up sneaker and exactly what I was looking for my holiday. True fit - I’m a size 13 wide fitting .
customer_reviews.author: Brian Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable from the top rear
customer_reviews.text: The back of this shoe is very uncomfortable because it is hard and it digs into the back of your foot. The trainers look really good and are comfortable from the bottom, but they caused me a lot of pain and that is even after wearing them for 2 days - which I thought would make them soften.
customer_reviews.author: athar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the money
customer_reviews.text: First set of sketchers and won't be the last, so light and comfortable. Great shoes don't know how long they will last but after 2 weeks all seems amazing.
customer_reviews.author: coops

customer_reviews.title: Not great..blisters .
customer_reviews.text: Mine where comfy for 2 weeks and then they started to hurt my feet it multiple ways. And started falling apart inside.
customer_reviews.author: Josh atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble getting great fitting shoes as they normally don’t fit properly but these do. They feel like walking on cushions and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wall

customer_reviews.title: Ideal!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Skechers and they are excellent - just what I needed in a casual black shoe. And they fit perfectly without any problem from the high ankle shape that other reviewers have highlighted.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen James

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Still have these now, very comfortable. Soles faded fairly quickly but none the less are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: LJG

customer_reviews.title: Comfy as ever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, amazingly comfy, don’t want to wear anything else, tread worn pretty quick but may be down to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Lee.

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting wide fitting shoes, but ended up with standard fit, hoping that these will not give me walking problems
customer_reviews.author: Martin Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Once again a pair of great fitting shoes, Sketchers never let you down with the quality and workmanship, like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: leonard wilson

customer_reviews.title: Im not happy
customer_reviews.text: Im not happy at all, size 10 is way too large, I changed for a 9.5 but still too large.
customer_reviews.author: Japs3016

customer_reviews.title: It's like having the most comfortable slippers in the world but ...
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have these, you are missing out. It's like having the most comfortable slippers in the world but your outside
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. Bekri

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers trainers
customer_reviews.text: first time I have worn sketchers of any sort and I found them to be very comfortable and fit was good to
customer_reviews.author: mark reeves

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very comfortable and great price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. My son has broad feet so sketches are perfect for a wider fit and give well. He’s a size 41/2 so bought the 5. Fits perfect. He says the soles are very comfortable like slippers. Look smart. Quick delivery. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry from Worksop

customer_reviews.title: Different from last order
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered another pair about a year ago (probably from ebay) and the old one was a bit different , the layer under the laces were fixed to the sides, this one has a more usual built. I liked that other one a little bit better, but this one is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: One of the most comfortable shoes (if you use ankle length socks)
customer_reviews.text: They look perfect and the memory foam is incredibly comfortable, can't believe I hadn't tried this before. Only slight problem is when using invisible socks the shoe can hurt the back of your foot. With ankle length socks it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Muhamad G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastically comfortable trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastically comfortable trainers...best I have ever owned . Would wholeheartedly recommend them to others looking for very comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work as on feet all day. Fit as expected. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: IJ

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: great shoes as expected from skechers would recomend to anybody
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daily use
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable and not narrow, this is why I use them every day!
customer_reviews.author: aserto

customer_reviews.title: Skechers No 1
customer_reviews.text: Love Skechers and these didn’t let me down, and what a great price, more please
customer_reviews.author: stephen coles

customer_reviews.title: Heel lip causes irritation
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of Skechers before and they're amazingly comfortable, but this one unfortunately fails to hit the mark. They are well cushioned as expected and when standing still or walking a short distance, they're comfortable. They look great too. Unfortunately the heel lip isn't well designed - it's caused the top of my heal massive discomfort resulting in a sore redness after a moderate amount of walking over an ~8 hour period. I couldn't wear these unless I had thick socks on to cause less rubbing. Had the heel lip had any sort of padding, this wouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: TechLAD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but issues causing heel blisters
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very light and comfortable fitting as you’d expect from Skechers, however the back of the shoe is not well designed. It’s pretty solid and rubbed against my heel / Achilles causing blisters, so had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Basketter

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam is a bad idea in shoes
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. Caused blisters on both heels within a mile due to the memory foam allowing movement up and down against the back of the shoe. Advertised as the most comfortable shoes in the world. What a joke. They are so uncomfortable I can't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: mr hd-dvd

customer_reviews.title: nice comfy trainers, good gripping sole
customer_reviews.text: I've been thinking of sketches for quite some time, when it was time to get rid of my under armour these were my choice considering the good price they were selling at, very comfy sole, the best i've ever had. Nice shoes and design too, cosnidering the fact that sketchers have no good design aesthetics
customer_reviews.author: Amadeus

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect. Very comfortable. I'm on my feet for 12 hours straight, and these trainers are the 1st I've had that when I wear, I get no feet or lower leg pain. Cool feet too, not hot or sweaty! So good, I bought another pair within days.
customer_reviews.author: andy richards

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Burst-Donlen Trainers
product_meta.description: Locate that sweet spot where comfort and style combine in the SKECHERS Burst - Donlen shoe. Soft woven sporty knit fabric upper in a lace up casual sneaker with stitching accents and Air Cooled Memory Foam insole.
